def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_small = is_small(x, ctx) and is_small(y, ctx)
        check_xy_almost_identical = abs(get_distance(x, y, ctx)) < 0.1
        check_xy_close = all_close([x,y], ctx)
        check_xy_diagonal_line = is_line([x,y], ctx) and is_above(y, x, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_small
            and check_xy_almost_identical
            and check_xy_close
            and check_xy_diagonal_line
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_black_large = is_black(x, ctx) and is_large(x, ctx)
        check_yz_small_light = all([is_small(dot, ctx) and is_light(dot, ctx) for dot in [y,z]])
        if (
            check_xyz_triangle
            and check_x_black_large
            and check_yz_small_light
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
